author: cnbc.com
title: ULTA SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Notifies Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Ulta Beauty, Inc.
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Law Offices of Vincent Wong notifies investors of an investigation concerning whether Ulta Beauty, Inc. (“Ulta Beauty” or the “Company”) (NASDAQGS: ULTA) violated federal securities laws.
Click here to learn about the case: http://docs.wongesq.com/ULTA-Info-Request-Form-1837 . There is no cost or obligation to you.
On February 9, 2018, it was reported that a consumer class action lawsuit had been filed against Ulta. The suit alleges that Ulta has secretly been repackaging returned cosmetics and re-shelving them alongside unblemished products to sell at full price. On February 23, 2018, CBS News published a story on the alleged restocking practice, citing a former employee who alleged that managers pressured store employees to clean and repackage returned cosmetics “to keep the dollar amount for damaged or returned goods down.”
To learn more about the investigation of Ulta Beauty contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email vw@wongesq.com , by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit http://docs.wongesq.com/ULTA-Info-Request-Form-1837 .
Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
